panels.description: Cluster ID as provided by PVC.

panels.description: If VM is migrated, the last node, or "No".
panels.title: Migrated

panels.description: VM autostart flag as provided by PVC.
panels.title: Autostart

panels.description: Description as provided by PVC.
panels.title: Description

panels.description: vCPU count as provided by PVC.
panels.title: vCPUs

panels.description: vCPU topology (Sockets/Cores/Threads) as provided by PVC.
panels.title: vCPU Topology

panels.description: Memory value (MB) as provided by PVC.
panels.title: vRAM

panels.description: Node limits as provided by PVC.
panels.title: Node Limits

panels.description: Failure Reason as provided by PVC.
panels.title: Failure Reason

panels.description: CPU time as reported by Libvirt, in milliseconds.
panels.title: CPU Time

panels.description: Memory utilization of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Memory Utilization

panels.description: Memory page faults of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Memory Page Faults

panels.description: Memory swap utilization of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Swap Utilization (+ in/- out)

panels.description: Packets per second for each NIC of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Packets (+ RX/- TX)

panels.description: Bytes per second for each NIC of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Traffic (+ RX/- TX)

panels.description: Drops per second for each NIC of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Drops (+ RX/- TX)

panels.description: Errors per second for each NIC of VM as reported by libvirt.
panels.title: Errors (+ RX/- TX)

panels.description: I/O requests per second each disk of VM as reported by libvirt; "sdz" (metrics disk) excluded explicitly.
panels.title: IOPS (+ Read/- Write)

panels.description: Data bytes per second each disk of VM as reported by libvirt; "sdz" (metrics disk) excluded explicitly.
panels.title: Data (+ Read/- Write)
